Original:
這間飯店是萬豪酒店集團裡面最差勁，整體完全不推薦!!
一，連續3天晚上lounge bar提供的湯，就是隔天的早餐的湯， 敷衍！
二，連續3天晚上lounge bar的2樣菜+炒飯，都一樣，敷衍！
三，沙拉及水果，連續3天只有換了葡萄，三天都一樣，敷衍！
四，甜點區的蛋糕，除了第1天有5個馬卡龍，三天都一樣!
五，房務人員打掃房間可以把一張房卡摸走，才跟我說找不到了，大廳服務員補給我房卡時竟說我要再多一張房卡是嗎?? 管理是這樣的??
六，Check in時說連假check out時間是11:00, 我是會員還要用據理力爭才能到13:00!
七，happy hour還有限定時間，只能用餐1小時。這2樣菜+炒飯確實只需要20分鐘，我認同happy hour是去休息喝飲料的，使用時間會被限制我很難理解!
EN:
This hotel is the worst in Marriott Hotel Group, and it is not recommended as a whole !!
First, the soup provided by Lounge Bar for 3 consecutive nights is the soup of breakfast the next day, perfunctory!
Second, the two -kind of Lounge Bar's 2 dishes+fried rice in Lounge Bar for 3 consecutive days are the same, perfunctory!
Third, salads and fruits have only changed grapes for 3 consecutive days, all three days, perfunctory!
Fourth, the cake in the dessert area, except for 5 macarons on the first day, is the same for three days!
Fifth, the housing staff cleaned the room and could touch a house card before I told me that I couldn't find it. When the waiter in the hall was supplied to my room card, I said that I would have another room card ?? Is it like this? What's more?
Six, check in when you say that the CHECK OUT time is 11:00, I am a member and we must fight with it to 13:00!
Seven, HAPPY HOUR still has a limited time, only 1 hour for meals.These two dishes+fried rice do only take 20 minutes. I agree that Happy Hour is going to rest and drink drinks. It will be difficult to understand when using time!

Original:
士林萬麗酒店的英式下午茶套餐可以選擇在 Tea Lab 茶坊或 R Bar 享用，套餐內容都一樣，差別在於用餐環境不同，Tea Lab 氛圍比較有下午茶的感覺，而 R Bar 則是酒吧風。

一套下午茶套餐 $1680 供一組兩位享用，餐點內容包含鹹點與甜點及飲品。鹹點及甜點的風格是創意風，混搭很多不同的元素在餐點設計上，使得他們看起來很繽紛，至於口味我覺得並沒有到好吃，可以說是差強人意，而最令人失望的是飲品的選擇很少、了無新意，讓我覺得這並不是英式下午茶該有樣子。
EN:
The British -style afternoon tea package of Shilin Wanli can be enjoyed at Tea Lab tea house or R Bar. The content of the package is the same. The difference is that the dining environment is different. The Tea Lab atmosphere is more like afternoon tea, and R Bar is a bar style.

A set of afternoon tea set $ 1680 for a group of two -bit enjoyment. The content of the meal includes salty and desserts and drinks.The style of salty dots and desserts is creative style. Many different elements mix and match on the design of the meal, which makes them look colorful. As for the taste, I don't think it is delicious. It can be said to be bad. There is very little choice of drinks, and I feel that this is not the British afternoon tea.

The boundless swimming pool also shows different colors from the earthy yellow floor tiles of the border to the pool to the blue sky to the right green forest in the sun.On the other side, you can shoot a wedding banquet.
Shilin Kitchen is one of the few restaurants I have lived in the breakfast that I have lived in so satisfied.I hope you will also experience this beautiful accommodation hotel in person.
